input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Organic Cotton Shop Tee"
Reference Product Description:
The heavyweight champ of our tailored tee shirt lineup, The Organic Cotton Shop Tee is crafted from a burly organic cotton jersey with a subtle ribbed finish for increased stretch and comfort. Built to stand up to the most demanding of days, this one stays on hand all year long and gets better with every wear.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's The Movement Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Sunwashed Slub Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Cloud Long Sleeve Henley'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Cloud Reversible Crew T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Sunwashed Cropped Crew Tee'
  - Name='Faherty Shirts Faherty Size Xxl Flannel Shirt Men's Nwt $148 Black Heather Plaid'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Brand Men's Heathered Cotton Blend Henley Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Organic Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Faherty Men's Organic Cotton T-Shirt'
  - Name='Women's Bombas Pima Cotton Slim Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Women's Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Men's Premium Weight Cotton Blend T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Men's Premium Weight Cotton Blend T-Shirt 3-Pack'
  - Name='Bombas Women's Merino Wool Blend Long Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Shirts Men's Crewneck Short Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Women's Air Slub Long Sleeve Cotton Blend T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Women's Pima Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt 3-Pack'
  - Name='Bombas Men's Merino Wool Blend Long Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Bombas Pima Cotton Pocket Crew Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Bombas Women's Pima Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Bombas Pima Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Essential Organic Long-Sleeve T-Shirt'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Premium-Weight Relaxed Crew Neck T-Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a cotton T-shirt similar to the reference, likely lightweight and casual, sharing core fabric type and function as a T-shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's The Movement Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Named as a shirt rather than a T-shirt, likely a different silhouette and usage (possibly performance or button-up). Less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Sunwashed Slub Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A tee shirt with a slub texture, similar casual shirt style though fabric and weight may differ from heavyweight organic cotton.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Cloud Long Sleeve Henley
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve henley differs significantly in sleeve length and neckline style from a crew neck tee, reducing relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Cloud Reversible Crew T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Crew neck T-shirt is similar in silhouette but reversible feature and possibly lighter fabric may differ from heavyweight tailored tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Sunwashed Cropped Crew Tee
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cropped length changes the silhouette significantly from standard tee, reducing relevancy though still a crew tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Shirts Faherty Size Xxl Flannel Shirt Men's Nwt $148 Black Heather Plaid
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Flannel shirt is a different construction and material entirely, not a cotton tee shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Sunwashed Regenerative Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sunwashed regenerative cotton tee aligns well with organic heavyweight cotton tee in terms of fabric and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Brand Men's Heathered Cotton Blend Henley Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Henley style and cotton blend differ in neckline and fabric composition from a heavyweight organic cotton crew tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Organic Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very close match with organic cotton T-shirt likely similar fabric and construction, closely aligned product type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Organic Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very close match with organic cotton T-shirt likely similar fabric and construction, closely aligned product type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Organic Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate entry of the above, same rationale applies for high relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Faherty Men's Organic Cotton T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate entry of the above, same rationale applies for high relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Women's Bombas Pima Cotton Slim Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim crew neck cotton tee similar in style but womenâ€™s fit and pima cotton differs somewhat from heavyweight unisex or men's organic cotton tee.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Women's Crew Neck T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Crew neck cotton tee similar category, though likely lighter weight and women's cut.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Men's Premium Weight Cotton Blend T-Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's premium weight cotton blend tee roughly corresponds to heavyweight organic cotton tee, similar function and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bombas Men's Premium Weight Cotton Blend T-Shirt 3-Pack
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as previous but in a multipack; product type and features are essentially identical.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's crewneck short sleeve tee closely matches reference in style, function and silhouette.
